resources.string: Note: When adding a navigation graph to your project, if you haven\'t already added navigation dependencies to your app\'s build.gradle file, Android Studio displays a prompt and offers to add the dependencies for you. Note, however, that Android Studio 3.4 adds the non-KTX 1.0.0 versions of the dependencies, so be sure to replace these values if you are using Kotlin or intend to use version 2.0.0 or higher.
